title: My Forever Life
description: Corina Harper's life has gone from bad to worse. After living on her own from the age of 16 she finds herself in an abusive marriage and has decided to get out. After coming up with a three stage plan to rid herself of her hateful husband, she leans on her two best friends for help and support. Just as things start going as planned she begins to have feelings for one of her best friends. Can she pull herself out of this nightmare? And if she does, will her best friend welcome her new feelings or will she be alone?
author: Susan  Phelps
